Subskills.name: Arctic Breeze
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sweep freeze.

Subskills.name: Weakening Precision
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Frost Sunder Onslaught
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a barrage of piercing icicles towards target on hit.

Subskills.name: Ice Giants Strength
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using sweep freeze and damage based on your vitality.

Subskills.name: Ice Giants Agility
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using sweep freeze.

Subskills.name: Frozen to the Core
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Shattering Coldstrike
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Lingering Fissure
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a fissure knocking monsters up on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Unstoppable Assault
Subskills.description: Unleash a barrage of sweep freezes for a short duration dealing increased damage and slowing monsters on hit with a chance of dropping chunks of ice at target location on hit.

Subskills.name: Double Sweep
Subskills.description: Chance to perform an additional attack.

Subskills.name: Frozen Death
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by sweep freeze.

Subskills.name: Cold Vacuum
Subskills.description: Every third attack with sweep freeze deals increased damage pulling monsters towards you.

Subskills.name: Dissecting Vortex
Subskills.description: Performs a whirling vortex attack dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Gelid Riptide
Subskills.description: Unleash a gelid riptide dealing damage over time slowing monsters on hit.
